entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:27 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 06:27 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:27 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
